content.content: With these constraints BruteForce is accepted, I believe either constraints should be higher, or problem level should not be Hard

The hints and editorial solution don\'t match. I personally solved it using the monotonic stack approach, which felt like a medium level question. The RMQ approach mentioned in the hints is a bit more advanced, just because of the obscurity of the RMQ data structure, which is probably why the problem was marked as hard.
